description.narrative: The programme is being implemented in Zimbabwe

title.narrative: Governments and other actors are accountable for their commitments on SRHR and HIV/AIDS

description.narrative: Governments and other actors are accountable for their commitments on SRHR and HIV/AIDS

title.narrative: Governments and other actors are accountable for their commitments on SRHR and HIV/AIDS

description.narrative: This indicator aims to measure the degree to which governments and other actors, including international bilateral and multilateral donors and technical partners, are accountable for their commitments on SRHR and HIV/AIDS

title.narrative: Key population movements collaborate strategically with each other and other relevant civil society actors

description.narrative: Key population movements collaborate strategically with each other and other relevant civil society actors

title.narrative: Number of joint strategies developed and implemented by community-based organisations and key population movements

description.narrative: This indicator aims to measure the extent to which Love Alliance investments have supported the development and implementation of joint advocacy efforts among community-based organisations and key population movements at the national, subnational, regional, subregional or global level

title.narrative: Key population movements have diverse leadership and increasingly engage in policy making processes and decision making

description.narrative: Key population movements have diverse leadership and increasingly engage in policy making processes and decision making

title.narrative: Number of National platforms and mechanisms that support community coordination, planning and engagement in-country processes established/strengthened

description.narrative: This indicator aims to measure the extent to which Love Alliance investments have established or strengthened platforms and mechanisms that support community coordination, planning and engagement at the national level

title.narrative: Policymakers and decision-making bodies engage with and include key populations within (inter)national fora, processes and the development of (inter)national strategies and policy

description.narrative: Policymakers and decision-making bodies engage with and include key populations within (inter)national fora, processes and the development of (inter)national strategies and policy

title.narrative: Policy makers and decision-making bodies engage with and include key populations within (inter)national fora, processes and the development of (inter)national strategies and policy

description.narrative: This indicator aims to measure the degree to which policy makers and decision-making bodies engage with and include key populations in fora, processes and development of strategies and policy.

title.narrative: Diverse KP communities are organised and meaningfully inclusive and have strengthened their capacity to claim their rights and freedoms

description.narrative: The formation or/and strengthening of coalitions/platforms/networks which represent Key Populations through Love Alliance investments

title.narrative: Number of inclusive coalitions/platforms/networks formed and strengthened

description.narrative: This indicator aims to measure the extent to which Love Alliance investments have supported the formation or strengthening of inclusive organizing mechanisms, including coalitions, platforms, networks or other similar mechanisms at the national, sub-national, regional or sub-regional level
